fruits.name: Cultivar Swing on CG1
fruits.description: Late harvest, sweet, crisp texture, medium storage (3-4 months), aromatic

fruits.name: Cultivar Ladina on CG1
fruits.description: Mid-late harvest, balanced sweetness and acidity, long storage (5-6 months), juicy

fruits.name: Cultivar Gallwa on CG1
fruits.description: Mid-season, high sweetness, slightly tangy, firm flesh, long storage (6+ months)

fruits.name: Cultivar Pitch on M9
fruits.description: Early harvest, very sweet, soft flesh, short storage (2-3 months), suitable for fresh eating

fruits.name: Cultivar Pixie on CG1
fruits.description: Late-season, aromatic, slight bitterness, good for cider, long storage (6+ months)

fruits.name: Cultivar Early Crunch on M9 Nakab
fruits.description: Very early harvest, crunchy, high acidity, short storage (1-2 months), refreshing taste
